author: horwat
msg: Fix escape character quoting. As outlined in JSP 1.2 PFD section 2.6

author: craigmcc
msg: Make Jasper depend on the DTDs from servlet.jar (in the same way that
Catalina was just changed) to avoid out-of-sync problems.

author: craigmcc
msg: Make Catalina dependent on the DTD files inside servlet.jar (built from
the jakarta-servletapi-4 repository) rather than maintaining its own
copies, which run the risk of being out of date all the time.

author: craigmcc
msg: Correct the default classname for the Loader implementation, which is used
when you specify a <Loader> element without a "className" attribute.  Also
correct the doc reference to the default Loader implementation, which is
